interface.name: ThreadDeathEvent
interface.javadoc:
Notification of a completed thread in the target VM. The notification is generated by the dying thread before it terminates. Because of this timing, it is possible for {@link VirtualMachine#allThreads} to return this thread after this event is received.

Note that this event gives no information about the lifetime of the thread object. It may or may not be collected soon depending on what references exist in the target VM. EventQueue VirtualMachine ThreadReference Robert Field 1.3

Returns the thread which is terminating.
a {@link ThreadReference} which mirrors the event's thread in the target VM.
